org.jboss.narayana.blacktie.jatmibroker.xatmi.impl

类 SessionImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.narayana.blacktie.jatmibroker.xatmi.impl.SessionImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Session

    public class SessionImpl
extends Object
implements Session
    A session reference may either be obtained from the tpconnect Connection invocation for a client or retrieved from the TPSVCINFO structure for a service (assuming the service was invoked within the scope of a tpconnect). It is used to send and retrieve data: ConnectionImpl#tpconnect(String, BufferImpl, int, int) TPSVCINFO_Impl#getSession()

    • 方法详细资料

      • setCreatedState

        public void setCreatedState(long flags)
        Set the state of the session using the flags. This is so we can respond from the service easily with the ACK that the client expects in initialization of the connection.
        参数:
        flags -

      • close

        public void close()
           throws ConnectionException
        Close the session
        抛出:
        ConnectionException

      • tpsend

        public int tpsend(Buffer toSend,
                  int flags)
           throws ConnectionException
        Send a buffer to a remote server in a conversation
        指定者:
        tpsend 在接口中 Session
        参数:
        toSend - The outbound data
        flags - The flags to use
        抛出:
        ConnectionException - If the message cannot be sent.

      • tprecv

        public Buffer tprecv(int flags)
              throws ConnectionException,
                     org.jboss.narayana.blacktie.jatmibroker.core.conf.ConfigurationException
        Received the next response in a conversation
        指定者:
        tprecv 在接口中 Session
        参数:
        flags - The flags to use
        返回:
        The next response
        抛出:
        ConnectionException - If the message cannot be received or the flags are incorrect

      • tpdiscon

        public void tpdiscon()
              throws ConnectionException
